thread.title: Jay Cutler body-shamed over vacation photo with wife
thread.title_full: Jay Cutler body-shamed over vacation photo with wife | New York Post

author: Jaclyn Hendricks
title: Jay Cutler body-shamed over vacation photo with wife
text:
A photo posted by Kristin Cavallari (@kristincavallari) on Jan 16, 2017 at 9:28am PST 
The Bears’ season may have ended in December, but quarterback Jay Cutler is still getting tackled by critics.
After wife Kristin Cavallari posted a snap on Instagram of the couple on vacation, Cutler was met with a slew of comments criticizing his offseason physique.
“Jay been eatin them pancakes!” a user wrote on social media, according to the Chicago Tribune .
“He looks so flabby,” shared another.
While Cavallari has yet to disable the comments — let alone acknowledge them — it appears the former star of “The Hills” and Cutler are enjoying their Mexican getaway, which he planned for his lady’s 30th birthday.
“I had the best birthday of my life and it was all thanks to this guy. Not only did he plan a huge surprise party, he planned a ‘surprise’ trip to Mexico with some of my closest friends, too. Thanks, babe….you will probably never see this,” Cavallari gushed on social media.
Cutler, 33, missed 11 games this past season with finger and shoulder injuries. And it is expected to be his last in Chicago, with the Bears likely to release him with $16 million owed to him next season.
